pages.text: A $(item)Froglight$() is a luminous natural block that can be obtained if a $(thing)Frog$() eats a tiny $(thing)Magma Cube$(). $(br2)It is used for decoration.

There are three colors of $(thing)Froglight$() that drop depending the type of frog: $(br)$(li)$(n)Pearlescent$() from warm (white) frogs $(br)$(li)$(n)Verdant$() from cold (green) frogs $(br)$(li)$(n)Ochre$() from temperate (orange) frogs
They emit light level 15, the highest level possible for a light-emitting block.
